turkish_example_sentence: O beyaz peyniri almazsa, kahvaltı eksik kalır.
english_example_sentence: If she doesn't take the white cheese, breakfast will be incomplete.
russian_example_sentence: Если она не возьмет белый сыр, завтрак будет неполным.
